channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street cleaning, 1st December
item.description:
Street has not been cleaned for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stembridge Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 mattresses, old carpet etc flytipped, 1st December
item.description:
Old mattresses, bedding etc flytipped on pavement at Chesholm Road end of Lavers Road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chesholm Road, Hackney, London

item.title: 2 black sofas flytipped, 1st December
item.description:
Sofas dumped by bike hangar opposite 46-48 Lavers Road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lavers Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish once again near the parking spaces in front of 47/49/51/53 Bournewood Road., 1st December
item.description:
This is a recurring thing. It has already happened a few times and we have collected the trash ourselves. It would be great to check the contents and find the offender.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bournewood Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress on pavement outside 13 southlands rd, 1st December
item.description:
Mattress on pavement not only an eyesore but will cause an obstruction during this bad weather. Has been there since mid last week and requires urgent removal
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southlands Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken water pipe, 1st December
item.description:
Reporting a leak in the communal parking area of the estate. The leak appears to be coming from the pipe itself or a blocked drain at the base. I’ve attached photos showing the wate

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fanshaw Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light flashing on and off every 5 secs, 1st December
item.description:
Broken light. Not sure if it’s because it’s raining so hard it’s affected electrics.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Discarded nitrous oxide canisters, 1st December
item.description:
Alley is used regularly by young children on their way to primary school and the canisters are in the pathway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairmead, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 16, 1st December
item.description:
Double mattress dumped on pavement
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Far too many leaves built up, 1st December
item.description:
Massive buildup of dead leaves - seemingly no clearing this autumn. Deep banks of dead leaves particularly near church. Will gradually rot in wet weather and block drains, causing flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vassall Road, Oval, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No lighting in nesbitt walk, 1st December
item.description:
No lighting in nesbitt walk been reported several times Buisnesses frightened coming out at night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, High Street, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drug use, home to thieves, 1st December
item.description:
This house is frequented by drug users, thieves, who terrorise three local area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163, Star Lane, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Litter and bin is full, 1st December
item.description:
Litter and bin not emptied
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Doveney Close, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside no46, 1st December
item.description:
Tree has snapped, likely in a strong wind. It has been moved off the road but we would be grateful if someone could dispose of it and replace it. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18-56, Chester Road, Dartmouth Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paint everywhere, 1st December
item.description:
Paint is all over the pavement and the road outside 44,42,40,38 Brightfield road. Clearly been driving through up and down the road and needs clearing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brightfield Road, Blackheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pitch is gone, 1st December
item.description:
There have been plumbing works near the pitch and this has caused there to be patchy mud. What is the point of a football pitch if you cant play on it? The community would appreciate the fixing of this pitch very much as it was heavily used. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Betts Close, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car with large trailer attached left for months, 1st December
item.description:
Trailer has been chained to lamppost and left for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lytchet Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotting leaves, 1st December
item.description:
Leaves from the trees fallen, and have started to rot and become mulchy and slippery
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lytchet Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large patches of mud and grass on football field after plumbing work, 1st December
item.description:
The pitch is completely unusable after plumbing repairs nearby and it has been this way for almost a month now. Our local community would massively appreciate repairs. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Betts Close, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter collecting through out the street, 1st December
item.description:
Please could the road be regularly cleaned as litter collects every day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westfield Road, Beckenham, Greater London
